_sText:
The Second Instalment from my Aperture Experiment Series!
In this universe, Aperture science simulates combats in order to study the subjects (you and the bots). Each map is enclosed in a cube, where anyone who attempts to escape will certainly die! So fight for your survival and win! Winners get cake at the end!

There are two houses, a castle and a brick house. There are teleports (look for the blue light) that sends you to the enemy house, but be aware as you are for a second or two, you are vulnerable to be shot down while falling. You can also try to walk through the floating surfaces.

One bombsite, is very obvious, and its in the middle of the map.

There is a train constantly going from one house to the other

Remember to take cover, and watch out for those breakable walls

Up to 18 players

9 vs. 9


Release 1.0
First map release, so bare with me. I'll promise to keep improving it and fixing it, so send your ideas and what you think I should add.

Developed by Eugenio 'motanum' Roman
Bugs, comments, suggestions to agent_2114@hotmail.com

If you take this map for your server online DONT FORGET TO SEND ME YOUR I.P. address so I CAN JOIN along!

More maps from me to come

Special thanks to 3kliksphilp for his support, guidance, and tutorials at http://3kliksphilip.com/index.html

See screenshots

Installation, just paste the all of the files in the ZIP on your maps folder for counter strike source

Default should be Files\Steam\steamapps\Account_Name\counter-strike source\cstrike\maps
